page.title: 10Education on Papa Stour.
page.content: The present school on Papa Stour is 100 years old and up to 56 pupils have been recorded.In 1970 the school closed because there were no pupils. It reopened 4 years later,and the present roll of 4 pupils is aged between 7-11 years.The sole teacher is helped out on 2 afternoons a week by her husband who teaches Art. At the age of 12,the children go to the Mainland for their secondary education.This means that they live away from home in a hostel or lodgings They can usually come home at weekends between Easter and October but during the winter the weather prohibits this. In 1900 Mr.Robertson wrote in the school log,"On Wednesday the ink-wells were so closely frozen over that copy- writing had to be postponed for the day".I wonder what he would have thought of "Fred" our micro?.......
